name: Energy Collector (personion)
description:
TO PLAY:

Start off with coal: Buy coal power plants if you can aford them with your current energy, by clicking on the "BUY" button. Your energy production will go up, and your energy consumption (utilization) along with it, slowing down your production. Increase your energy production on and on until you reach nuclear power, one of the strongest and fastest ways of generating power.
